item.title: White Man's Burden
item.description: Term refers to the idea that white people have a moral obligation to civilize and educate the non-white people of the world, especially those living in colonized or oppressed regions.

item.title: Partition by W.H Auden
item.description: by [[WH Auden]] About the Author #todo Summary and themes about the India - Pakistan partition in 1947 angry about partition, directed towards Radcliffe
